* Iron Raptor received the message from Plintissa and sighed, when was that 
bot NOT in trouble? She looked out of her window one last time then 
activated her comlink again...*

"I'm on my way."

* She deactivated her comlink and stood up, at least this was a good time to 
try out her new weapon. She walked out of her quarters and down to the 
bridge, that was when she walked up to Tigerhawk...*

" Plintissa's in trouble, facing 3 Preds by herself. I'm going to lighten up 
her load, be back before the Preds attack, alright? Just thought you'd like 
to know, bye!"

* Iron Raptor growled as she came to the base doors and opened them, there 
was another transformer that had answered Plintissa's plea for 
assistance...but who?
Well, at least the fight wouldn't just be 2 against 3 like she feared it 
would.
She closed the door behind her and looked out into the distance, she had 
located Plintissa on her scanners when she had answered but it was a good 
distance away from her.*

"Beast Mode!"

* Now transformed she ran off in the direction that her systems showed that 
Plintissa was located, she reopened her comlink as she ran...*

" Plintissa, I'm on my way. I should be there in the next 15 cycles."
